Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a 448-foot home run off Jack Flaherty in the fifth inning.
Dylan Cease held the Dodgers to three runs over five innings.
San Diego's bullpen was affected by six walks, leading to their loss.
Post-Match Reflections: Padres manager Mike Shildt emphasized the team's determination to continue fighting for the division title.
Fernando Tatis Jr. expressed confidence in the team's ability to secure a postseason spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres' loss affects their NL West chances but they remain in the postseason race.
San Diego's performance and strategies were discussed post-game.
